product_name: The North Face Shiso Gloves - Women's
long_description: Soft and sleek, The North Face Shiso gloves keep your hands warm when you're running errands or out walking the dog. Soft polyester silken fleece is very warm yet low profile so you'll have good dexterity while wearing these gloves. Women-specific 5 Dimensional Fit(TM) uses 5 measurements of the hand to construct gloves with an accurate and consistent fit. Articulation improves warmth and blood flow by mirroring the natural relaxed curve of your fingers. The North Face Shiso gloves have synthetic gripper material on the palms and elastic at the wrists.
short_description: Soft and sleek, The North Face Shiso gloves keep your hands warm when you're running errands or out walking the dog.
